tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE MusicalLibrary (
    score_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    score_title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    composer VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    genre VARCHAR(100),
    recording_id INT,
    recording_title VARCHAR(255),
    recording_artist VARCHAR(255),
    recording_duration INT
)

CREATE TABLE scores (
    score_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    composer VARCHAR(100),
    genre VARCHAR(50),
    release_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE recordings (
    recording_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    artist VARCHAR(100),
    format VARCHAR(50),
    duration TIME
);

CREATE TABLE Scores (
    score_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    composer VARCHAR(255),
    genre VARCHAR(100),
    publication_year INT
);

CREATE TABLE Recordings (
    recording_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    artist VARCHAR(255),
    album VARCHAR(255),
    release_year INT
);

CREATE TABLE Score_Recordings (
    score_id INT,
    recording_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (score_id, recording_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (score_id) REFERENCES Scores(score_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (recording_id) REFERENCES Recordings(recording_id)
);

CREATE TABLE scores (
    score_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    composer VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    genre VARCHAR(50),
    year_published INT
);

CREATE TABLE recordings (
    recording_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    artist VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    duration INT,
    release_year INT
);

CREATE TABLE composers (
    composer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    composer_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    nationality VARCHAR(50),
    birth_year INT,
    death_year INT
);

CREATE TABLE artists (
    artist_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    artist_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    nationality VARCHAR(50),
    debut_year INT,
    active BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE scores( 
    score_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
    title VARCHAR(255), 
    composer VARCHAR(255), 
    genre VARCHAR(255), 
    publication_year INT 
);

CREATE TABLE recordings( 
    recording_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
    title VARCHAR(255), 
    artist VARCHAR(255), 
    duration TIME, 
    release_year INT 
);
